snippet: The Rangers have agreed to terms with the free-agent forward Matthew Lombardi, a veteran N.H.L. player who spent last season in Switzerland.
abstract: New York Rangers add veteran forward Matthew Lombardi, who spent 2013 season playing for Geneve-Servette in Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers have agreed to terms with the free-agent forward Matthew Lombardi, a veteran N.H.L. player who spent last season in Switzerland.
